name: Fail to set the player's name due to missing authorization
scenarioId: player-name:Fail to set the player's name due to missing authorization
methodName: Fail to set the player's name due to missing authorization

testSteps.description: Given the Yahtzee game is initialized
When the client sends a PUT request to "/playerName" without authorization

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: application/json
Date: Thu, 10 Oct 2024 21:05:08 GMT
Content-Length: 70

testSteps.description: Then the response status should be 401 Unauthorized
And the response body should contain an error message "Basic auth missing or could not be parsed"

title: Fail to set the player's name due to missing authorization
